title: Couscous à la Greque
directions: Heat oil in heavy large pot or Dutch oven over high heat. Add next 6 ingredients and sauté until vegetables are just tender, about 12 minutes. Add broth, oregano and thyme and bring mixture to boil. Mix in couscous. Turn off heat; cover pot. Let stand 10 minutes.
Season couscous with salt and pepper. Mix in feta cheese, chopped tomatoes and chopped mint and serve.
ingredients: 2 Japanese eggplants, trimmed, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
